title: New: Polycoma – Come What May
body: Based on **Polycoma’s** debut track, _Come What May_, it’s fair to assume that the duo (Calen Lucas and Justin Wright) are Tame Impala fans. Hazy, reverb soaked guitar lines and the sort of psychedelic vocal production that littered Kevin Parker’s Lonerism. Bold, gloriously over the top and undoubtedly euphoric, it’s a debut worthy of hype. Come What May by Polycoma
